alert.note: Alert for Carroll (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 3:49PM EDT until July 21 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN YORK...SOUTH CENTRAL OXFORD...WEST CENTRAL CUMBERLAND AND EAST CENTRAL CARROLL COUNTIES... At 348 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Effingham, or 9 miles northeast of Ossipee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bridgton, Naples, Ossipee, Buxton, Hollis, Hiram, Effingham, Cornish, Standish, Waterboro, Limington, Limerick, Brownfield, Freedom, Denmark, Eaton, Parsonsfield, Sebago, Baldwin and Porter. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
